Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: DONNA C TOLBERT
Reviews.Content: Pictures are not as clear also a yellow tint to them I would not but this again never again would I pay this amount  for this one

Reviews.Title: Not good but not bad simply ok
Reviews.Author: Jesse Dejesus
Reviews.Content: Nothing really special about this camera just basic and picture look ok not great should have bought a better one

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Arthur Luciano
Reviews.Content: Has a ton of great features.  Love the manual mode that let's me take some awesome shots. Bought this as a starter camera for my daughter.  Its a great camera to learn on before you spend $1000 on a pro camera

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: sean
Reviews.Content: I chose this product due to the fact that they were in my price range, of a good quality, and the amount of accesories,.

Reviews.Title: LOVES IT
Reviews.Author: MEP
Reviews.Content: THIS WAS A CHRISTMAS PRESENT FOR MY SISTER, SHE ABSOLUTELY LOVES IT. SHE USES IT EVERY SINGLE DAY. SHE TOOK PICTURES OF THIS CAMERA AND POSTED THEM TO FACEBOOK

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Lynn M. Brisco
Reviews.Content: I am leaving on a trip to Mexico & my old camera quit working. I just love this one, and & has all of the accessories with it, plus it takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great Value for the price
Reviews.Author: Susan "music explorer"
Reviews.Content: This kit has great value for its price. The camera is good, and the range of accessories is an added bonus.

Reviews.Title: canon camera package
Reviews.Author: Linda Wrigley
Reviews.Content: Xmas gift for hubby, loves everything about it, I made a good choice, TY, Linda Wrigley.  Happy New Year to All

Reviews.Title: Not good
Reviews.Author: Debera Jeror
Reviews.Content: This is really staticky. The pics aren't very good :L And the cleanser was leaking all over!:L Otherwise it's okay

ProductInfo.Features:
16.0 Megapixel sensor and Canon DIGIC 4 Image Processor deliver enhanced image quality.
Capture impressive 720p HD video in stereo sound with a dedicated movie button and zoom while shooting.
Large 3.0" LCD offers easy viewing even from a wide angle.
Canon's powerful 16x Optical Zoom and 28mm Wide-Angle lens with Optical Image Stabilizer helps reduce camera shake so you achieve brilliant images whether you are up close or far away.
Intelligent IS automatically chooses from six different modes to optimize image stabilization for shake-free images in a wide variety of conditions.
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot SX170 IS 16MP Digital Camera with 16x Optical Zoom and 3-inch LCD in Red + 8GB SDHC + Compact Camera Case + Mini Tripod + Accessory Kit
